title: Session Context Propagation
summary: Adds support for propagating session context, such as user ID and session timestamps, across distributed message streams.

title: Enhanced Consumer Error Handling
summary: Introduces improved error handling for Kafka consumers, including detailed error logs and automatic retry mechanisms.

title: Schema Registry Compatibility Update
summary: Modifies the schema registry to ensure compatibility with the latest Avro and Protobuf versions.

title: Revise Connector Documentation for Third-Party Systems
summary: Expand the connector documentation to provide comprehensive guidance on integrating third-party systems with Apache Kafka, including practical examples and troubleshooting tips.

title: Schema Registry Enhancement for Streamlined Data Ingestion
summary: Modifies the schema registry to support additional metadata for improved data ingestion and processing.

title: Enhanced Connector Testing Framework
summary: Develops a comprehensive testing suite for validating Kafka Connect integrations with external systems.

title: Stale Consumer Group Cleanup
summary: Introduces a mechanism to periodically remove inactive consumer groups to improve cluster performance.

title: Concurrency Control Overhead in Message Processing
summary: Excessive overhead in managing concurrent message processing leads to delays, impacting system performance under load.

title: High Latency During Peak Load
summary: Increased message processing time during peak usage periods, leading to delayed data delivery.
